mapper.insert:
insert into kaoqin(dangAnId, shangWuShangBan, xiaWuXiaBan, zhuangTai, dangTianRiQi,qingJiaZhuangTai,qingJiaBiaoId) values
( #{item.dangAnId},#{item.shangWuShangBan},#{item.xiaWuXiaBan},#{item.zhuangTai},#{item.dangTianRiQi}, #{item.qingJiaZhuangTai},#{item.qingJiaBiaoId} )
mapper.select: select chidao, zaotui, kuanggong, qingjia from (select count(id) as chidao from kaoqin where zhuangTai = 2 and dangAnId = #{dangAnId}) as chidao, (select count(id) as zaotui from kaoqin where zhuangTai = 3 and dangAnId = #{dangAnId}) as zaotui, (select count(id) as kuanggong from kaoqin where zhuangTai = 0 and dangAnId = #{dangAnId}) as kuanggong, (select count(id) as qingjia from kaoqin where qingJiaBiaoId <> 0 and dangAnId = #{dangAnId}) as qingjia
